alert.note: Alert for Livingston; Ontario (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 03 at 5:32PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT EASTERN LIVINGSTON AND ONTARIO COUNTIES THROUGH 630 PM EST... At 531 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Geneseo to near Conesus to near Arkport. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Geneva, Canandaigua, Dansville, Conesus, Bristol, Lima, Bloomfield, Naples, Rushville, Hemlock, Honeoye, Gorham, East Bloomfield, West Bloomfield, Springwater, Canadice, Livonia, Seneca Lake State Park, Seneca Castle, and Hunt Hollow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
